ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF((CEC_Updated_from_IWT__c =false), IF( AND( OR( $Profile.Name == "UPS CEC CCR", $Profile.Name == "UPS CEC Specialized User"), ISCHANGED(OwnerId), Case_Owner_Role__c == null, CONTAINS(CEC_Original_Queue_Name__c, "CEC"), CONTAINS(CEC_Original_Queue_Name__c, "SRC") ), True, False ), False )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cases cannot be assigned to this queue or user.
